overview:
Brett G. Durrett is the VP of Engineering and Operations for IMVU, an online community where members use 3D avatars to meet new people, chat, create and play with their friends.

IMVU has reached 50 million registered users, 10 million unique visitors per month and a $40 million annualized revenue run rate. IMVU has the world’s largest virtual goods catalog of more than 4 million items, almost all of which are created by its own members.

Prior to IMVU Brett served as VP Operations and GM of the consumer service for There.com. He also co-founded and served as CEO of Asylum Entertainment, a game development company producing 20 game titles over a 5-year period before being acquired by a software publisher.
